---
title: "shared.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines enums, constants, and configuration options related to Carequality IHE Gateway V2 implementation. It provides standardized response codes, acknowledgment codes, and XML builder attributes for use in the Carequality integration.

## Symbols

### `queryResponseCodes`
#### Description
An enum that defines possible response codes for queries.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| OK | string | Indicates a successful query |
| NF | string | Likely indicates "Not Found" |
| AE | string | Likely indicates "Application Error" |

### `ackCodes`
#### Description
An enum that defines possible acknowledgment codes.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| AA | string | Likely indicates "Application Acknowledgment" |
| AE | string | Likely indicates "Application Error" |

### `attributeNamePrefix`
#### Description
A constant string that defines the prefix for attribute names in XML processing.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| attributeNamePrefix | string | The prefix "@_" used for attribute names |

### `xmlBuilderAttributes`
#### Description
An object that defines configuration options for XML building and parsing.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| xmlBuilderAttributes | object | Configuration options for XML processing |

#### Internal Logic
The `xmlBuilderAttributes` object includes the following settings:
- `format`: Set to `false`, likely to disable automatic formatting
- `ignoreAttributes`: Set to `false`, ensuring attributes are not ignored
- `attributeNamePrefix`: Set to the `attributeNamePrefix` constant
- `suppressEmptyNode`: Set to `true`, likely to remove empty XML nodes
- `declaration`: An object specifying XML declaration details (encoding and version)

## Dependencies
This file doesn't explicitly import any external libraries or modules.

## Configuration
The `xmlBuilderAttributes` object serves as a configuration for XML processing:

| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| format | boolean | false | Disables automatic formatting |
| ignoreAttributes | boolean | false | Ensures attributes are not ignored |
| attributeNamePrefix | string | "@_" | Prefix for attribute names |
| suppressEmptyNode | boolean | true | Removes empty XML nodes |
| declaration | object | \{ include: true, encoding: "UTF-8", version: "1.0" \} | XML declaration settings |

## References
This file is likely referenced by other parts of the Carequality IHE Gateway V2 implementation, particularly those dealing with query responses, acknowledgments, and XML processing.
